content: Of course, if you feel like a change, just <color=#38b6c5>open your backpack and select unequip</color>.

content: I was sorting out my luggage just now, and guess what I found? A lovely <color=#97c344>fascinator</color>!
info: 幻雪送礼-幻雪(废弃，准备并入200801）_主流程文本3

content: This was meant to be a housewarming gift for my new neighbors.\nAfter that Maelstrom,\nI completely forgot about it!
info: 幻雪送礼-幻雪(废弃，准备并入200801）_主流程文本3

content:
Press <color=#38b6c5>E</color> to open your Backpack,
select the <color=#97c344>Top Hat</color>
and try wearing it, shall we?
info: 幻雪送礼-幻雪(废弃，准备并入200801）_主流程文本3

content:
While you can find many beautiful outfits in Loomi, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>
the gifts I give come with my heartfelt sentiments!
